alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:32PM EST until January 12 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTRY WEATHER EXPECTED TO BRING SLIPPERY CONDITIONS TO THE AREA THIS AFTERNOON INTO TONIGHT... .A mix of snow and light freezing rain is expected the rest of this afternoon and into this evening, eventually changing to all rain, heavy at times overnight. Snow will accumulate several inches in the mountains and foothills. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wet snow mixed with light freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch along with a glaze of ice. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal Cumberland and Coastal York Counties. In New Hampshire, Strafford, Eastern Hillsborough, and Interior Rockingham Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible due to icy road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
